programme.title: Roller Kata Ep05

programme.title: A Taste of Cold Steel
programme.desc: It's a no-holds-barred battle to the death for possession of the invaluable Purple Sword, as the Five Tigers take this adventure to the outer limits.

programme.title: Hong Kong Nocturne
programme.desc: Three sisters (the quietest and most filial of whom is played by Cheng Pei Pei) attempt to sing and dance their way to happiness.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: A righteous man who can't fight and an unjustly wronged swordsman team up to battle against evil.

programme.title: The Invincible Fist
programme.desc: A village's dedicated chief constable falls in love with the blind daughter of a havoc-wreaking bandit.

programme.title: Five Tough Guys
programme.desc: Guaranteed to sweep the audience off their feet, this battle between a usurper of the throne and patriots led by Wu Wen-yuan climaxes in an eventful ending!

programme.title: The New One-Armed Swordsman
programme.desc: A swordsman (David Chiang) is moved to fight back after the love of his life is kidnapped and his best friend murdered by a gang.

programme.title: The Singing Killer
programme.desc: A singer is blackmailed into committing a heist but when he finds his first love working in the store which he's supposed to rob.

programme.title: Brave Archer and His Mate
programme.desc: Fourth in the hugely popular series, the leader of 'Venom', supported by his fellow members and Brave Archer associates, sets out to defeat a mass murderer.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Ding, a con woman swindles a diamond ring off a rich man, but when it ends up in another man's hands, she now has to get it back.

programme.title: Clan of Amazons
programme.desc: This action-packed adventure centres on a mysterious masked highwayman who not only steals from the rich but also blinds them!

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: When the younger of two brothers becomes a villain, tragedy lurks when his elder brother makes it his mission to take him down.

programme.title: The Long Chase
programme.desc: The chase may be long, but the action is fast and furious, in this tale of a dart master-for-hire and the innkeeper's daughter who loves him.

programme.title: Hex Vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: After a compulsive gambler's wife leaves him, he gets offered a beautiful ghost as his new wife.

programme.title: Pursuit
programme.desc: Written and directed by Cheng Kang, this classic film starring Yueh Wah depicts how the Sung Dynasty army's chief instructor is framed by a corrupt minister.

programme.title: Operation Lipstick
programme.desc: A motorcycle workshop owner feels compelled to damn the physical and legal consequences and go on racing.

programme.title: Lady of the Law
programme.desc: One of director Shen Chiang's last works, this action-packed adventure features a lone female fighter, decades before the dawn of pro-feminist kung fu films.

programme.title: The Delightful Forest
programme.desc: A grateful convict becomes his prison officer's defender after he learns that the officer's restaurant has been taken over by a local thug.

programme.title: Vengeance of a Snow Girl
programme.desc: Enjoy Lo Wei's very last Shaw Brothers film, the fabulous tale featuring Li Ching of a frostbitten swordswoman out to get her parents' murderers.

programme.title: Full Moon Scimitar
programme.desc: Screen idol Derek Yee is the ambitious 'Meteor' master who becomes obsessed with sword supremacy and goes on a selfish rampage of violence and sex.

programme.title: Ambush
programme.desc: This intriguing action flick blends westerns and detective films in its martial arts mainline, depicting a tale of vigilante justice versus the law.

programme.title: Duel for Gold
programme.desc: Famed director Chor Yuen has three pairs of cunning crooks on a quest to steal a million gold taels from the Fu Lai Treasury House but one is undercover.

programme.title: The Younger Generation
programme.desc: After a young mother and her husband die, one child is sold into prostitution to feed the other four.

programme.title: The Knight of Knights
programme.desc: In seeking to avenge his six comrades' murders, a swordsman must battle against Qiao Qing Monastery's notorious monks.

programme.title: Till the End of Time
programme.desc: A singer struggles against the odds to keep her career and marriage intact. Starring Jenny Hu, Peter Chen Ho.

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: Veteran director Yen Chun excels in this tale of the Dragon Sword and the evil Security Agency, beautiful swordswomen and bandits who want it.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Linda Lin Dai plays a beauty tricked into sacrificing herself for the good of the Chinese people. However, the truth is revealed too late.

programme.title: The Silent Swordsman
programme.desc: The great martial clans of China seek to meet with the new Sun and Moon Sect leader and hatch a plan to resist invaders from the west.

programme.title: The Yellow Muffler
programme.desc: This Inoue Umetsugu musical depicts the struggle of two singing sisters, Ching Ping and Pai Hung.

programme.title: Fearless
programme.desc: This incredible true story of real-life hero, Huo Yuan Jia, depicts how one man fights to balance the scales by taking on a list of ferocious opponents.

programme.title: When Sun Meet Moon
programme.desc: Shortlisted at the 8th Beijing International Film Festival, starring Kathy Yuen & Daichi Harashima. Two young astrology enthusiasts meet under the starry night during a massive power outage in Hong Kong.

programme.title: Funny Soccer
programme.desc: Lam Chi Chung from Shaolin Soccer delivers another wildly nonsensical Hong Kong comedy with rock singer Shin as a crazy soccer team captain who pushes his team to victory!

programme.title: Love off the Cuff
programme.desc: In this third instalment, can Cherie and Jimmy overcome their seven-year itch? The path to finding the answer is filled with laughter and tears.

programme.title: The Sleep Curse
programme.desc: After two cult classic films from the 90s - director Herman Yau & Anthony Wong reunite, and together with Gordon Lam, Michelle Wai & Jojo Goh, challenge your limit in this paranormal thriller.

programme.title: The Golden Job
programme.desc: Former mercenaries reunite for a noble heist only to realize that one of them is double-crossing them. Filmed across Europe & Asia and stars Ekin Cheng, Jordan Chan, Michael Tse, Jerry Lamb & Chin Ka Lok.

programme.title: Hotel Deluxe
programme.desc: When service at the 5-star Bai Xing Hotel is not living up to its billing, tough executive Cruella Koo is sent to whip the employees into shape and inject a little glamour into the hotel.

programme.title: Legend of Mysterious Agent
programme.desc: Female students in Baicheng are missing and killed by vampires. Exorcism trio tries to hunt them down. A Millennium vampire disguises as the warlord, only to collect the blood of missing girls.

programme.title: Endgame
programme.desc: A remake from the Japanese movie Key of Life, Andy Lau, Xiao Yang and Wan Qian stars in this action comedy about the switched identities of an unsuccessful actor & a professional assassin.

programme.title: Colour of the Game
programme.desc: The final chapter of Wong Jing's Colour Trilogy. Jordan Chan and Simon Yam bring you into the criminal underworld of Hong Kong.

programme.title: Mad World
programme.desc: This award-winning film is based on the true story of a bipolar man who is placed in the custody of his truck-driver father after being released from a mental hospital.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: Bio Raiders
programme.desc: A famed doctor concocts an elixir of immortality to save his terminally ill daughter, but it involves drinking human blood. Twenty years later, the doctor's assistant makes a terrifying discovery.

programme.title: The Village of No Return
programme.desc: Shu Qi, Wang Qian Yuan & Joseph Chang star in this tale of a priest who extracts villagers' painful memories using a magical helmet, creating a fool's paradise.

programme.title: The Bodyguard
programme.desc: A retired bodyguard suffering from dementia finds a new friend in a little girl named Cherry. When her father's crime connections place her in danger, it is up to him to save her.

programme.title: Throw down
programme.desc: Johnnie To pays homage to his idol Akira Kurosawa in this all-star story of a former Judo champion who receives a second chance.

programme.title: Acting Out of Love
programme.desc: Hung Jen, struggling actor meets Hui Hsin, an associate producer who must write a script for a love story. He invites her out on a date as a research for her script and soon falls in love.

programme.title: All's Well, End's Well 2011
programme.desc: Claire works for Sammy, the CEO of a cosmetics company. She has a shot at a better life when a billionaire pursues her and asks Sammy for help- without realizing her feelings for him.

programme.title: Dr. Wai in the Scripture with No Words
programme.desc: Golden Horse Award winner for 'Best Visual Effects, this saga captures how a race begins when a former antiquarian goes in search of the lost, coveted Scripture with No Words.

programme.title: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: When a school bus driver is injured after risking his life to save a boy during an accident, the boy's father invites him to live with them. However, disturbing facts soon begin to emerge.

programme.title: Integrity

programme.title: Drink Drank Drunk
programme.desc: Due in court as a witness the next morning, Alan still gets raging drunk with friends the night before. Unexpectedly, this twilight haze leads to surprises.

programme.title: League of Gods
programme.desc: Jet Li, Tony Leung, Fan Bing Bing, Louis Koo, Huang Xiaoming, Angelababy & other big stars in this epic action-fantasy based on the novel, Fengshen Yanyi

programme.title: The Wedding Diary
programme.desc: A fisherman's son plans to marry the daughter of a rich developer. He promises a grand wedding but the cost is too high. He goes gambling and loses everything! Will the wedding go on?

programme.title: Rise of the Legend
programme.desc: The formative years of Wong Fei Hung see him defeat the Northern Sea's leader. Recognizing his talent, the Black Tiger's boss, Lei Gong, makes him his godson and one of his Four Tigers.

programme.title: The Conjuring
programme.desc: Two paranormal investigators are called upon to help a family terrorised by a dark presence in a farmhouse.

programme.title: The Conjuring 2
programme.desc: This supernatural thriller follows another real case from the files of renowned demonologists Ed and Lorraine Warren.

programme.title: Spontaneous
programme.desc: When students inexplicably start to explode, Mara and her friends stay close together as they await possible combustion - wondering what part of life is worth living if it might end suddenly.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An epic action-adventure with a breathtaking new vision of the legendary tale of Snow White.

programme.title: Come Away
programme.desc: Highly creative origin story of Peter Pan and Alice In Wonderland as siblings who, trying to save their parents from despair, choose between home and imagination.

programme.title: Bad Boys for Life
programme.desc: The Bad Boys Mike Lowrey (Will Smith) and Marcus Burnett (Martin Lawrence) are back together for one last ride in the highly anticipated Bad Boys for Life.

programme.title: Top Gun
programme.desc: Tom Cruise aims high as he vies to be the best Navy fighter pilot. A classic of the 80s that made Cruise a star.

programme.title: Battleship
programme.desc: An international naval coalition becomes the world's last hope for survival as they engage a hostile alien force in this epic action-adventure.

programme.title: Roald Dahl's the Witches
programme.desc: A little boy and his kindly grandmother thwart the efforts of a coven of witches to rid Britain of children by turning them into mice.

programme.title: The Addams Family
programme.desc: The Addams family lives begin to unravel when they face-off against a reality-TV host while also preparing for their extended family to arrive for a major celebration.

programme.title: Boss Level
programme.desc: Former Special Forces soldier Roy Pulver urgently needs to figure out why he is stuck in a repeating time loop in which he is killed violently in different ways every day.

programme.title: Who's by Your Side S1 Ep06
programme.desc: The ten-episode one-hour series explores relationship issues and marital challenges, and depicts painful dilemmas for the characters through a unique lens on their daily lives.

programme.title: Blumhouse's Fantasy Island
programme.desc: At a magical but remote island resort, lucky guests have their secret dreams realised. But when the fantasies turn into nightmares, the guests have to solve the island's mystery in order to escape.

programme.title: Doctor Sleep
programme.desc: 40 years after the terrifying events at Overlook Hotel, Dan Torrance found some semblance of peace which is quickly shattered when he met a courageous teenager with a powerful extrasensory gift.

programme.title: Sleepy Hollow
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays a fearless constable who has to confront the horrifying legend of the Headless Horseman in this Tim Burton-directed horror.

programme.title: Queen & Slim
programme.desc: On a first date, a black man and woman are stopped by a policeman over a minor traffic infraction. As the situation spirals, the man kills the officer in self-defense, forcing the two to go on the run.

programme.title: Psych 2: Lassie Come Home
programme.desc: After being ambushed on the job and left for dead, Police Chief Carlton Lassiter has begun to see impossible things around his recovery clinic, prompting Shawn and Gus to return to help.

programme.title: A Thousand Words
programme.desc: A glib man finds out that he has only 1000 words left to speak before he dies.

programme.title: The King'S Case Note
programme.desc: A clever King and his brilliant chronicle keeper hunt for the truth behind a crime that threatens the throne and the stability of the country.

programme.title: Confession of Murder
programme.desc: A police officer haunted for failing to capture a serial killer 15 years back, returns to the case after a novelist publishes the book 'I am the Murderer', claiming responsibility for the crimes.

programme.title: Love Guide for Dumpees
programme.desc: Two recently dumped singles spend a wild drunken night together to get over their exes, then agree to meet nine more times before promising never to see other again.

programme.title: Boys Be!
programme.desc: When two high school friends the best fighter in school and the other who hates physical conflict get involved in a fight involving local mobsters, they discover the true meaning of friendship.

programme.title: Part-Time Spy
programme.desc: A former contract worker at the National Security Agency works with an undercover detective to recover money that was stolen from her boss in a voice phishing scheme.

programme.title: Mr. Zoo: the Missing Vip
programme.desc: After discovering he can suddenly talk to animals, an intelligence agent partners with a canine pal to take care of a case gone sideways.

programme.title: Door Lock
programme.desc: A woman, living by herself, finds her door lock cover left open one day. Startled by this, she starts investigating on her own and finds more hints of someone trying to enter her home.

programme.title: Spellbound
programme.desc: Yeo-Ri sees ghosts and crazy things happen to the people around her. When she joins Jo-Goo's magic show, he offers to help her find a way out before the ghosts can chase him out of her life.

programme.title: Rv: Resurrected Victims
programme.desc: Surreal cases are reported globally where victims come back to life to avenge the murderer. One day, prosecutor Jin-hong's dead mother returns home and tries to kill him...

programme.title: Guimoon: the Lightless Door
programme.desc: As exorcist Do-jin heads over to an abandoned community center with rumors of strange deaths, he met 3 college students there to capture the rumored events and realised they're trapped...

programme.title: The Wailing
programme.desc: Suspicion leads to hysteria when rural villagers link a series of brutal murders to the arrival of a mysterious stranger.

programme.title: Gonjiam: Haunted Asylum
programme.desc: A handful of people are recruited to live stream a horror show at Gonjiam, Korea's most haunted hospital. To attract more viewers, scares are set up along the way, but soon things take a darker turn.

programme.title: Boomerang Family
programme.desc: A peaceful household is disturbed by the return of a woman's three grown children one after the other - Eldest son Han-mo, second son In-mo, and double divorce daughter Mi-yun.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: An old huntsman risks his life to protect a village girl from a group of treasure hunters after they witness the men commit murder.

programme.title: Masquerade
programme.desc: The story of the bizarre King Hwanghae and a look-a-like peasant, who stands in for the monarch when the King faces the threat of assassination.

programme.title: Where the Truth Lies
programme.desc: Two Korean-American students are accused of murder but the investigation is thrown into confusion when the two suspects present contradicting accounts and evidence, and blame each other for the crime.

programme.title: Lump of Sugar
programme.desc: A young girl is devastated when her best friend, a horse, is sold to another owner, but when they are reunited two years later they have a chance to create a miracle by teaming up in a race.

programme.title: My Paparotti
programme.desc: Music teacher Sang-Jin was asked to train Jang-Ho, a teenage gangster dreamed of being a world-class singer. Yet conflict arises between two local gangs and Jang-ho was forced into a difficult situation...

programme.title: The Himalayas
programme.desc: Based on true events, a renowned mountaineer sets out on a mission to Everest to retrieve his late junior climber's body and faces the greatest challenge of his life.

programme.title: The Classic
programme.desc: Ji-hae writes a love letter for her friend to a boy they both have a crush on. As the boy falls in love with her letters, she discovers that her mother also had a similar romance in the past.
